name: adsense_accounts_adclients_adunits_create
description: Creates an ad unit. This method can only be used by projects enabled for the [AdSense for Platforms](https://developers.google.com/adsense/platforms/) product. Note that ad units can only be created for ad clients with an "AFC" product code. For more info see the [AdClient resource](/adsense/management/reference/rest/v2/accounts.adclients). For now, this method can only be used to create `DISPLAY` ad units. See: https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/9183566

parent.description: Required. Ad client to create an ad unit under. Format: accounts/{account}/adclients/{adclient}

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

AdUnit.description: Representation of an ad unit. An ad unit represents a saved ad unit with a specific set of ad settings that have been customized within an account.

displayName.description: Required. Display name of the ad unit, as provided when the ad unit was created.

name.description: Output only. Resource name of the ad unit. Format: accounts/{account}/adclients/{adclient}/adunits/{adunit}

reportingDimensionId.description: Output only. Unique ID of the ad unit as used in the `AD_UNIT_ID` reporting dimension.

state.description: Required. State of the ad unit.

size.description: Required. Size of the ad unit. e.g. "728x90", "1x3" (for responsive ad units).

type.description: Required. Type of the ad unit.

$block: Representation of an ad unit. An ad unit represents a saved ad unit with a specific set of ad settings that have been customized within an account.

$ul: **size**: Required. Size of the ad unit. e.g. "728x90", "1x3" (for responsive ad units).
**type**: Required. Type of the ad unit.
**displayName**: Required. Display name of the ad unit, as provided when the ad unit was created.
**name**: Output only. Resource name of the ad unit. Format: accounts/{account}/adclients/{adclient}/adunits/{adunit}
**reportingDimensionId**: Output only. Unique ID of the ad unit as used in the `AD_UNIT_ID` reporting dimension.
**state**: Required. State of the ad unit.
